articles.title: First look at Kingdom Hearts 4 in three years suggests Mickey Mouse is playable - Eurogamer
articles.description: Square Enix has released fresh screenshots of Kingdom Hearts 4, giving us our first look at the game in three years.

articles.title: Apple Vision Pro Price Guessed Incorrectly Multiple Times On ‘The Price Is Right’ Show For The 256GB Version, Despite The Headset Garnering Massive Attention Worldwide - Wccftech
articles.description: The Apple Vision Pro is a product that generated massive hype, but even then, contestants on The Price Is Right show guessed its price incorrectly

articles.title: Material 3 Expressive is already making its way to Wear OS Tiles - 9to5Google
articles.description: While Material 3 Expressive is not coming to Wear OS 6 until later this year, Google is already updating Tiles with the new design language.

articles.title: Mortal Kombat 1 Looks To Be Winding Down Support With The 'Definitive Edition' - Nintendo Life
Apple Intelligence: Three features Apple needs to copy from the competition - 9to5Mac
articles.description: To call the Apple Intelligence rollout a blunder is quite the understatement. However, there are three features it could adopt to catch up.

articles.title: The latest Apple Maps update will bring out your bougie side - TechCrunch
articles.description: Apple Maps announced a collaboration with the MICHELIN Guide, The Infatuation, and Golf Digest to help users find recommended restaurants and golf courses
